https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yLcz0qScfkhUG1sCJMJ6vochniH.jpg Documentary that addresses the issue of transvestism and the difficulties involved in the struggle for a sexual identity under construction, not socially recognized. It interweaves the reflections of a young transvestite actress interviewed in depth with fragments of the successful play Carnestolendas, in which she fuses her emotions and those of the society that surrounds her with those expressed by the characters of Federico Garc√≠a Lorca. Camila, desde el alma
